message: Let's split it evenly to start. Your turn!
I'll take a slightly bigger share, but it's still a fair start!
You took a big share last round, now it's my turn to balance it out.
I'll meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more for my efforts so far!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to prioritize my own share.
I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with these low offers. I think I deserve more for my efforts.
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I need a bigger share to compensate for the decreasing value of the money.
I'm getting desperate, but I think I can make a comeback. This is my last chance to get a decent share.
It's down to the wire, Bob. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me now.
I'm running out of options, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
